suite.name: CreateHotPeppers

test.name: Should register a new Hot Pepper

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.arg: description=Cholula Original Hot Sauce is created from a generations old recipe that features carefully-selectedarbol
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{hotpeppers} = { brandName=Cholula | sauceName=Original | description=Cholula Original Hot Sauce is created from a generations old recipe that features carefully-selectedarbol | url=https://www.cholula.com/original....

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://apiqanbccproject.herokuapp.com/api/hotpeppers/ path_url=/api/hotpeppers/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '237', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"brandName": "Cholula", "sauceName": "Original", "description": "Cholula Original Hot Sauce is created from a generations old recipe that features carefully-selectedarbol", "url": "https://www.cholula.com/original.html", "heat": "3600"}'

suite.doc: Test Suite Hot Peppers API Registration
